verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> to you, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Do not learn <S%H3925><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> And do not be terrified <S%H2865><s%> by the signs <S%H226><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%> Although <S%H3588><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> are terrified <S%H2865><s%> by them;

For the customs <S%H2708><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> are delusion; <S%H1892><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> it is wood <S%H6086><s%> cut <S%H3772><s%> from the forest, <S%H9194><s%> The work <S%H4639><s%> of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of a craftsman <S%H2796><s%> with a cutting <S%H4621><s%> tool. <S%H4621><s%>

"They decorate <S%H3302><s%> [it] with silver <S%H3701><s%> and with gold; <S%H2091><s%> They fasten <S%H2388><s%> it with nails <S%H4548><s%> and with hammers <S%H4717><s%> So that it will not totter. <S%H6328><s%>

"Like a scarecrow <S%H8560><s%> in a cucumber <S%H4750><s%> field <S%H4750><s%> are they, And they cannot <S%H3808><s%> speak; <S%H1696><s%> They must <S%H5375><s%> be carried, <S%H5375><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> they cannot <S%H3808><s%> walk! <S%H6805><s%> Do not fear <S%H3372><s%> them, For they can do <S%H7489><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> harm, <S%H7489><s%> Nor <S%H1571><s%> <S%H369><s%> can they do <S%H3190><s%> any <S%H1571><s%> good. <S%H3190><s%>"
There <S%H369><s%> is none <S%H369><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> Thee, O Lord; <S%H3068><s%> Thou art great, <S%H1419><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> is Thy name <S%H8034><s%> in might. <S%H1369><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> would not fear <S%H3372><s%> Thee, O King <S%H4428><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>? Indeed <S%H3588><s%> it is Thy due! <S%H2969><s%> For among all <S%H3605><s%> the wise <S%H2450><s%> men <S%H2450><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> And in all <S%H3605><s%> their kingdoms, <S%H4438><s%> There <S%H369><s%> is none <S%H369><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> Thee.
But they are altogether <S%H259><s%> stupid <S%H9059><s%> and foolish <S%H3688><s%> [In their] discipline <S%H4148><s%> of delusion <S%H1892><s%> – their idol is wood! <S%H6086><s%>

Beaten <S%H7554><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> is brought <S%H935><s%> from Tarshish, <S%H8659><s%> And gold <S%H2091><s%> from Uphaz, <S%H210><s%> The work <S%H4639><s%> of a craftsman <S%H2796><s%> and of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of a goldsmith; <S%H6884><s%> Violet <S%H8504><s%> and purple <S%H713><s%> are their clothing; <S%H3830><s%> They are all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of skilled <S%H2450><s%> men. <S%H2450><s%>

But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is the true <S%H571><s%> God; <S%H430><s%> He is the living <S%H2416><s%> God <S%H430><s%> and the everlasting <S%H5769><s%> King. <S%H4428><s%> At His wrath <S%H7110><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> quakes, <S%H7493><s%> And the nations <S%H1471><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> endure <S%H3557><s%> His indignation. <S%H2195><s%>

Thus <S%H1836><s%> you shall say <S%H560><s%> to them, "The gods <S%H426><s%> that did not make <S%H5648><s%> the heavens <S%H8065><s%> and the earth <S%H778><s%> shall perish from the earth <S%H7><s%> and from under <S%H772><s%> the heavens. <S%H8460><s%>"

[It is] He who made <S%H6213><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> by His power, <S%H3581><s%> Who established <S%H3559><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> by His wisdom; <S%H2451><s%> And by His understanding <S%H8394><s%> He has stretched <S%H5186><s%> out the heavens. <S%H8064><s%>

When He utters <S%H5414><s%> His voice, <S%H6963><s%> [there is] a tumult <S%H1995><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> in the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> And He causes the clouds <S%H9347><s%> to ascend <S%H5927><s%> from the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> He makes <S%H6213><s%> lightning <S%H1300><s%> for the rain, <S%H4306><s%> And brings <S%H3318><s%> out the wind <S%H7307><s%> from His storehouses. <S%H214><s%>

Every <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H120><s%> is stupid, <S%H9059><s%> devoid <S%H4480><s%> of knowledge; <S%H1847><s%> Every <S%H3605><s%> goldsmith <S%H6884><s%> is put <S%H954><s%> to shame <S%H954><s%> by his idols; <S%H6459><s%> For his molten <S%H9333><s%> images <S%H9333><s%> are deceitful, <S%H8267><s%> And there is no <S%H3808><s%> breath <S%H7307><s%> in them.
They are worthless, <S%H1892><s%> a work <S%H4639><s%> of mockery; <S%H8595><s%> In the time <S%H6256><s%> of their punishment <S%H6486><s%> they will perish.

The portion <S%H2506><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is not like these; <S%H428><s%> For the Maker <S%H3335><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> is He, And Israel <S%H3478><s%> is the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of His inheritance; <S%H5159><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is His name. <S%H8034><s%>
Pick <S%H622><s%> up your bundle <S%H3666><s%> from the ground, <S%H776><s%> You who dwell <S%H3427><s%> under siege! <S%H4692><s%>

For thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am slinging <S%H7049><s%> out the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> At this <S%H384><s%> time, <S%H6471><s%> And will cause <S%H9503><s%> them distress, <S%H9503><s%> That they may be found. <S%H4672><s%>"

Woe <S%H188><s%> is me, because <S%H5921><s%> of my injury! <S%H7667><s%> My wound <S%H4347><s%> is incurable. <S%H2470><s%> But I said, <S%H559><s%> "Truly <S%H389><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> is a sickness, <S%H2483><s%> And I must bear <S%H5375><s%> it."

My tent <S%H168><s%> is destroyed, <S%H7703><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> my ropes <S%H4340><s%> are broken; <S%H5423><s%> My sons <S%H1121><s%> have gone <S%H3318><s%> from me and are no <S%H369><s%> more. <S%H369><s%> There <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> to stretch <S%H5186><s%> out my tent <S%H168><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> Or to set <S%H6965><s%> up my curtains. <S%H3407><s%>

For the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> have become <S%H9059><s%> stupid <S%H9059><s%> And have not sought <S%H1875><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they have not prospered, <S%H7919><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> their flock <S%H4830><s%> is scattered. <S%H6327><s%>

The sound <S%H6963><s%> of a report! <S%H8052><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> it comes <S%H935><s%> – A great <S%H1419><s%> commotion <S%H7494><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> – To make <S%H7760><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> A desolation, <S%H8077><s%> a haunt <S%H4583><s%> of jackals. <S%H8565><s%>

I know, <S%H3045><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> that a man <S%H376><s%>'s way <S%H1870><s%> is not in himself; <S%H376><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> is it in a man who walks <S%H1980><s%> to direct <S%H3559><s%> his steps. <S%H6806><s%>
Correct <S%H3256><s%> me, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> but with justice; <S%H4941><s%> Not with Thine anger, <S%H639><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> Thou bring <S%H4591><s%> me to nothing. <S%H4591><s%>

Pour <S%H8210><s%> out Thy wrath <S%H2534><s%> on the nations <S%H1471><s%> that do not know <S%H3045><s%> Thee, And on the families <S%H4940><s%> that do not call <S%H7121><s%> Thy name; <S%H8034><s%> For they have devoured <S%H398><s%> Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> They have devoured <S%H398><s%> him and consumed <S%H3615><s%> him, And have laid <S%H8074><s%> waste <S%H8074><s%> his habitation. <S%H5116><s%>
